description: This file defines a Flutter widget called QuickActionCard, which displays a card with an icon and a text label, and handles tap gestures. It is intended for use within a Flutter application to provide quick actions or shortcuts.

classes.name: QuickActionCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays an icon and text inside a card, which triggers a callback when tapped.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the QuickActionCard, returning a Card containing an InkWell, Padding, and a Column with an Icon and Text.
